messages.subject: Sammurai Reseach Help
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Group, In getting information on the Sammurai or Japanese history I suggest you read the James Clavell novel- Shogun. If you can get it,I believe they have
messages.messageBody:
Hi Group,
In getting information on the Sammurai or Japanese history I suggest you read the James Clavell novel- Shogun. If you can get it,I believe they have the mini series Shogun , which starred Richard Chamberlain, on video. Clavell's novel- Gai-Jin may also be of use to you in your report.
Being a Martial Artist, I found Clavell's entire Asian series enjoable. The novels in this series are: Shogun, Tai-Pan, King Rat, Noble House, Whirlwind and Gai-Jin.
Write back and keep in touch. This is one of my favorite topics; the Orient as always been one of my areas of interest.
Shadow
